channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Supreme Court lifts restrictions on LA immigration stops set after agents swept up US citizens
item.description: The Supreme Court is clearing the way for federal agents to conduct sweeping immigration operations in Los Angeles, another victory for President Donald Trump at the high court.

item.title: Jury selection begins in the trial of the man accused of attempting to assassinate Trump in Florida
Potential federal intervention poses challenges for Chicago police on the ground
